The first 22 spaces are reserved for variable names after which the variables are defines.
Lines which do not start with a recognised variable will be skipped.
Variables with multiple integers use the ", " seperator.

Variable             |Value
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
instruments           2

note_file_type        wav

velocity_bounds (<=)  0, 48, 96, 124
